faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating AI videos

1.question: What niches does Vidtory support?
1.answer: Vidtory supports a wide range of niches including stories, education, entertainment, marketing, sales, training, and more. We offer specialized templates and features for each niche to help you create the perfect video.

2.question: How does AI video generation work?
2.answer: Our AI technology uses advanced algorithms to generate realistic avatars, natural voiceovers, and professional animations. Simply provide your script and choose your preferences, and our AI will create a complete video for you.

3.question: Can I customize the AI avatars?
3.answer: Yes! You can choose from hundreds of pre-made AI avatars or create custom avatars that match your brand. Customize appearance, voice, and behavior to create the perfect presenter for your content.

4.question: What video formats can I export?
4.answer: You can export your videos in multiple formats including MP4, MOV, and WebM. We support various resolutions from 720p to 4K, optimized for different platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and more.

5.question: Is there a limit to video length?
5.answer: Free plans include videos up to 5 minutes. Premium plans support longer videos up to 30 minutes or more, depending on your subscription tier.

6.question: Can I use Vidtory for commercial purposes?
6.answer: Yes, all videos created with Vidtory can be used for commercial purposes. You own the rights to all content you generate through our platform.

7.question: Do I need video editing experience?
7.answer: No prior experience needed! Vidtory is designed to be user-friendly. Our intuitive interface and AI assistance make it easy for anyone to create professional videos, regardless of their technical background.

8.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
8.answer: Video generation typically takes 2-5 minutes depending on length and complexity. Shorter videos (under 1 minute) usually generate in under 2 minutes, while longer videos may take up to 5 minutes.

9.question: Can I edit videos after generation?
9.answer: Absolutely! Our built-in video editor allows you to make changes anytime. Edit text, swap avatars, adjust timing, add effects, and more - all without regenerating the entire video.

10.question: What languages are supported?
10.answer: Vidtory supports multiple languages for both voiceovers and subtitles. You can create videos in English, Spanish, French, German, and many other languages to reach a global audience.
